ComicInfo.Summary: Sworn to Protect: Professor X refuses to answer Hulk's question as to which way he would have voted with the Illuminati in sending Hulk into exile. He agrees to go with Hulk as a prisoner but the X-Men refuse to let him leave. A new fight ensues and Hulk decimates the X-Men, breaking Colossus' arms and turning Wolverine's brains to mush. Reinforcements arrive.
